detail_desc: Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Short, A-line coat in sturdy twill with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets with a decorative flap and button, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline at the front, medium coverage at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Printed top and leggings. Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.

Knee-length tunic in crisp cotton poplin with a high, smocked stand-up collar, lace embroidery at the top and covered buttons at the back. V-shaped yoke with broderie anglaise at the front and an opening at the back. Long, wide raglan sleeves with inset trims and wide, smocked cuffs with embroidered lace trims. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit, warming wool and cashmere blend with a wide turn-up at the hem.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit with hole-knit sections. Buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, fly with a visible zip, fake zipped front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 60 denier.
Dungarees in a patterned, organic cotton weave with straps that button at the front. Open side pockets, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems.
Long, loose-fitting T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif. Roll-edge neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, twisted side seams and a raw-edge hem.

Sweatpants in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend. Regular waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, discreet pockets in the side seams and a welt back pocket. Gently tapered, ankle-length legs with creases down the front and good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt, pleats and the top and a zip in the side. Zip fly with hook and eye fasteners, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide tapered legs.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Blouse in airy viscose crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in washed stretch denim with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a decorative knot detail at the hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back, short, narrow shoulder straps and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, ties at the back of the neck, an open back and wide, sewn-on ties at the front of the waist.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a print motif, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft slub cotton jersey with woven flounces and a woven section with broderie anglaise on the front. Small opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed collar, V-neck and ribbed trims around the sleeves and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 3 cm to 8.5 cm.
Top in an airy, crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back, a horizontal tie at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a seam and wide double flounce.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the front of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a low-cut back with crossover straps. Glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with a gently draped collar, V-neck and wrapover front. Long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Unlined.

Padded jacket in a nylon weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with press-studs and a faux-fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Long dress in satin with a sheen. Draped, wrapover front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, seam under the bust and pleated skirt. Satin lining.
Leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist and  fake front pockets.
Maxi dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow elastication under the bust and a wide, tiered skirt.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back with narrow shoulder straps at the back and an elastic hem.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a low-cut back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tiered skirt with a concealed zip in one side. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, chunky-knit cashmere with a V-neck and a tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a broderie anglaise flounce over the shoulder seams.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Cap in woven fabric with text embroidery at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in rib-knit cotton with lace details and a lace-trimmed V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Hats in soft, organic cotton jersey with a foldover hem. One ribbed and one with an all-over print.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
One-shoulder dress in an airy weave with a metallic coating. One long, wide sleeve with a buttoned cuff, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a pile-lined, faux fur-trimmed hood. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with buttons down the front and flap front pockets. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Straight-cut jacket in soft pile with a high collar and chunky zip down the front. Jetted handwarmer pockets, concealed pockets at the bottom of the side seams and low dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a low, roll-edge neckline and roll edges around the sleeves.
Short-sleeved tops in soft jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Flared skirt in patterned cotton poplin with a smocked waist.
Dress in stretch jersey with a print motif on the front, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a lined, layered tulle skirt with an asymmetric hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Calf-length, gathered dress in woven fabric with decorative frill trims. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with a button at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gathered, frill-trimmed seam around the skirt for added volume at the hem. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with fabric appliqués, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Set with six hair clips and 20 clip-free hair elastics in various colours. Length of hair clips 4 cm. Circumference of hair elastics 8 cm.
Mesh trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and diagonal pockets.
Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons at the top.
Earrings in hammered metal decorated with plastic sparkly stones. Length 6.5 cm.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Puffer jacket in nylon with a zip down the front and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
